badtz-maru.name: Badtz-Maru
badtz-maru.description: Bad Badtz-Maru (バッドばつ丸, Baddo batsu maru) is a character designed by Sanrio. He is a black penguin with spiky hair and a commonly un-amused face. His birthday is on the first of April, April Fool's Day.
badtz-maru.creator: Sanrio

hello-kitty.name: Hello Kitty
hello-kitty.description: Hello Kitty (ハローキティ, Harō Kiti) is a fictional character produced by the Japanese company Sanrio. She is depicted as a cute anthropomorphic white cat with a red bow.
hello-kitty.creator: Yuko Shimizu

my-melody.name: My Melody
my-melody.description: My Melody (マイメロディ, Mai Merodī) is a Sanrio character who is a little girl rabbit with a hood. She is often depicted with her hood covering her ears.
my-melody.creator: Sanrio

cinnamoroll.name: Cinnamoroll
cinnamoroll.description: Cinnamoroll (シナモロール, Shinamorōru) is a Sanrio character who is a white puppy with long ears and a tail that looks like a cinnamon roll.
cinnamoroll.creator: Sanrio

keroppi.name: Keroppi
keroppi.description: Keroppi (けろけろけろっぴ, Kerokero Keroppi) is a Sanrio character who is a frog. He is depicted as having large eyes and a V-shaped mouth.
keroppi.creator: Sanrio
